meanings.definition: A device that counts the number of steps taken by a person.
meanings.sent1: I use pedometers to track how many steps I take each day.
meanings.sent2: The gym instructor handed out pedometers to help us monitor our daily activity.
meanings.sent3: The pedometers had a dance-off to see which one could count the most steps!
meanings.sent4: Her determination to reach her step goal made the pedometers work overtime.
meanings.sent5: The pedometers chirped happily every time someone took a step.
